autoFocus.description: When set to true, the Modal is opened and is automatically focused on its own, accessible to screen readers

backdrop.description: When set to true, the Modal will display the background when it is opened. Clicking on the background will close the Modal. If you do not want to close the Modal, set it to 'static'.

backdropClassName.description: Add an optional extra class name to .modal-backdrop It could end up looking like class="modal-backdrop foo-modal-backdrop in".

bodyFill.description: Remove default padding from the dialog and body so the content can occupy the full height. Useful for creating custom layouts with full-width/height content.

centered.description: Align the modal vertically in the center of the page.

classPrefix.description: The prefix of the component CSS class

dialogAs.description: You can use a custom element type for Dialog

dialogClassName.description: CSS class applied to Dialog DOM nodes.

dialogStyle.description: CSS style applied to Dialog DOM nodes.

enforceFocus.description: When set to true, Modal will prevent the focus from leaving when opened, making it easier for the secondary screen reader to access

keyboard.description: Close Modal when `esc` key is pressed.

onEnter.description: Callback fired before the Modal transitions in

onEntered.description: Callback fired after the Modal finishes transitioning in

onEntering.description: Callback fired as the Modal begins to transition in

onExit.description: Callback fired right before the Modal transitions out

onExited.description: Callback fired after the Modal finishes transitioning out

onExiting.description: Callback fired as the Modal begins to transition out

overflow.description: Automatically sets the height when the body content is too long.

size.description: Determine the width of the modal

as.description: You can use a custom element for this component

classPrefix.description: The prefix of the component CSS class

as.description: You can use a custom element for this component

classPrefix.description: The prefix of the component CSS class
